topic.title: GeoLite2 City
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.6.2
  * Operating system: Windows 10
  * Web browser: Waterfox
  * Tor status: Unknown
  * Opened port: No
  * Special configuration: None

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
When I was using ZeroNet, a file called GeoLite2 City was downloaded to my data directory in my ZeroNet folder. After some googling, I saw it was referenced in some code on here. Anyway I could disable random files being downloaded without my permission? Was it part of ZeroNet? I'm new to this, so apologies if I seem confused.

#### Steps to reproduce:

(don't know what this means)

#### Observed Results:

The file just sat in /data/ and I deleted it.

#### Expected Results:

I don't know
